reviews.text: 1050 N Grove Rd, Richardson, TX 75081 Dreaming of a backyard oasis by summer 2026? Better get started now! Our team can design and build the custom pool you’ve always wanted. Contact us today for a quote and let’s make your vision a reality.

"He was diligent with answering my requests for options as well his work." "A bit on the expensive side, but the service and quality of our pool is great!" "Staff is courteous and communicates well, responding to voicemail quickly."

Our pool has never looked better with Josh and Integrity Pools. We used them for tile replacement and then for comprehensive weekly cleaning. Excellent work. Josh leaves a written report on our patio after every visit detailing his work. Price is reasonable - less than our former company and they do more work. Highly recommend! More Response from the owner 4 weeks ago Thank you, Kim, for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you're enjoying our services and the detailed reports from Josh.

Wanna come swim in my pool? No. No one would. Integrity Pools started off strong and then has progressively gotten worse over time. I had high hopes, however, when you can’t control algae, it makes me wonder what else is being skipped over. … More Response from the owner 7 months ago We will be taking corrective action based on everything you have said.
